title: Phone app not working
content: Inbound calls come in from the same number multiple times after answering.   I am also unable to hangup with the hangup button on both inbound and outbound.   I have uninstalled the phone app updates, uninstalled other apps that were recently installed, and I have done a factory reset. The issue still persists.
category: Contacts, Calls, Voicemail, Google Pixel 4 XL
